heading: HR00790
0: A RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING FILIPINO PRODUCER JHETT TOLENTINO FOR WINNING THE BEST MUSICAL THEATER AWARD FOR HIS "THE COLOR PURPLE" IN THE 59TH ANNUAL GRAMMY AWARDS CEREMONY HELD ON FEBRUARY 12, 2017 AT THE STAPLES CENTER, LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-02-21

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00790
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING FILIPINO PRODUCER JHETT TOLENTINO FOR WINNING THE BEST MUSICAL THEATER AWARD FOR HIS "THE COLOR PURPLE" IN THE 59TH ANNUAL GRAMMY AWARDS CEREMONY HELD ON FEBRUARY 12, 2017 AT THE STAPLES CENTER, LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA
